message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $150. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only pay $120 for the product. Thank you for understanding.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $140.  Would that work for you?
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer, but I can only afford to pay $130 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
